Ryoto, Wilds Walker CRF
U 1U 2 Legendary Creature - Human Ranger Creature 2/1
2 Flash When Ryoto enters, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains reconstruct until end of turn. Its reconstruct cost is equal to {2} plus its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile it.)

WB WB 2 Creature - Spirit Creature 1/1
2 Lifelink At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature you control get +2/+2 and lose all abilities until end of turn.

BR 2BR 4 Creature - Human Rogue Creature 2/1
2 Menace When Remnant of Rocket enters, create a 3/2 white Beast creature token. Whenever Remnant of Rocket and at least two other creatures attack, Remnant of Rocket deals 3 damage to the defending player. Beast
Ravenous Flytrap CRF
BG BG 2 Creature - Plant Creature 1/1
2 Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Then if this is the third time this ability has triggered this turn, you may return a creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)

Karina, Out of Time CRF
UBR UBR 3 Legendary Planeswalker - Karina Planeswalker 3
1 Paradox — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, put a loyalty counter on Karina. [-1]: Exile the top card of each player’s library. You may play cards exiled this way until the end of your next turn by discarding a card, sacrificing a permanent, or paying 3 life in addition to their other costs, and you may spend mana of any color to cast them this way. [-4]: Exile a card from your graveyard. You may cast a card exiled by Karina without paying its mana cost.
